title: CampusKart
hookLine: Forgot your charger in hostel? CampusKart's already on the way.
description: A hyperlocal delivery app for campus essentials built by students of IIT Delhi.
author: Rohan Mehta

title: BudgetPal
hookLine: Track every chai, maggi, and metro ride — automatically.
description: An expense tracking app designed for Indian college students on a tight budget.
author: Sneha Iyer

title: StudySync AI
hookLine: Convert your syllabus into smart summaries — instantly.
description: AI-based summarizer for textbooks, built by two indie hackers.
author: Ankit Sharma

title: BookMates
hookLine: Why buy books when you can borrow them across your campus?
description: A P2P book rental marketplace used across 30+ Indian campuses.
author: Ananya Joshi

title: GigGrow
hookLine: Turn your skills into side income while you’re still in college.
description: Platform helping students find freelance gigs relevant to their skills.
author: Sahil Verma
